mapper.insert: insert into landing.S_ORG_EXT_X ( row_id , created , created_by , last_upd , last_upd_by , par_row_id , X_FLT_ACCT_TYPE , X_FLT_IND_TYPE , ATTRIB_07 , X_TOT_FLT_SIZE , X_FLT_ORG_TYPE ) values ( '1-90ABC' , now() , '1-1GPM' , now() , '1-1GPM' , '1-90ABC' , #{fleetAccontType} , #{industryTrend} , #{numberOfEmployee} , #{totalFleetSize} , #{organizationType} ) ;
